dmca.title: Horsekeeping complains of article posted to blog
dmca.body:
Hello, 

We are [private] and [private] and we own and operate 
www.horsekeeping.com 

We have a good faith belief that the our copyrighted material consisting of 451 words is being used without our authorization on following web page: 

http://worldofanna.blogspot.com/2003_07_01_worldofanna_archive.html


The portion of the article that is being infringed is highlighted on Copyscape here: 

http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=98606&u=http%3A%2F%2Fworldofanna.b logspot.com%2F2003_07_O1_worldofanna_archive.html&t= 1127501633&s=http%3 A%2F%2Fwww.horsekeeping.com%2Fhorse_health_care%2Fgelding_andaftercare htm&w=61&c= 

This use of copyrighted material is in violation of the DMCA and Sec.4 (e) of 
Blogspot.com Terms of Service http://www.blogger.com/terms.g:
You agree to not use the Service to: 
(e) upload, post or otherwise transmit any Content that infringes any patent, 
trademark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights of any party; 

Our original copyrighted article is posted on page 
http://www.horsekeeping.com/horse_health_care/gelding_and_aftercare.htm 

We believe that the information in this notification is accurate and under penalty of perjury that we are the owners of the copyrighted materials mentioned above that we believe are being infringed.

We appreciate very much anything you can do to take down the aforementioned infringed material. 

Alternatively, you have permission to post the title of the article and only the first two sentences followed by this phrase:
